00001 /*! \file
00002  *      \brief The first user program - 
00003  *             the test case follows the structure of the producer consumer 
00004  *             example in Tanenbaum&Woodhull's book.
00005  *
00006  */
00007 
00008 #include <scwrapper.h>
00009 
00010 long buffer[16];
00011 int  head=0;
00012 int  tail=0;
00013 
00014 long empty_semaphore_handle;
00015 long mutex_semaphore_handle;
00016 long full_semaphore_handle;
00017 
00018 void thread(void)
00019 {
00020  /* This is the consumer. */
00021 
00022  while(1)
00023  {
00024   long value;
00025 
00026   if (ALL_OK != semaphoredown(full_semaphore_handle))
00027   {
00028    prints("semaphoredown failed!\n");
00029    break;
00030   }
00031 
00032   if (ALL_OK != semaphoredown(mutex_semaphore_handle))
00033   {
00034    prints("semaphoredown failed!\n");
00035    break;
00036   }
00037 
00038   value=buffer[tail];
00039   tail=(tail+1)&15;
00040 
00041   if (ALL_OK != semaphoreup(mutex_semaphore_handle))
00042   {
00043    prints("semaphoreup failed!\n");
00044    break;
00045   }
00046 
00047   if (ALL_OK != semaphoreup(empty_semaphore_handle))
00048   {
00049    prints("semaphoreup failed!\n");
00050    break;
00051   }
00052 
00053   printhex(value);
00054   prints("\n");
00055  }
00056  terminate();
00057 }
00058 
00059 void
00060 main(int argc, char* argv[])
00061 {
00062  register long  counter=0;
00063  register long  thread_stack;
00064 
00065  empty_semaphore_handle=createsemaphore(16);
00066  if (empty_semaphore_handle<0)
00067  {
00068   prints("createsemaphore failed!\n");
00069   return;
00070  }
00071 
00072  full_semaphore_handle=createsemaphore(0);
00073  if (full_semaphore_handle<0)
00074  {
00075   prints("createsemaphore failed!\n");
00076   return;
00077  }
00078 
00079  mutex_semaphore_handle=createsemaphore(1);
00080  if (mutex_semaphore_handle<0)
00081  {
00082   prints("createsemaphore failed!\n");
00083   return;
00084  }
00085 
00086  thread_stack=alloc(4096, 0);
00087 
00088  if (0 >= thread_stack)
00089  {
00090   prints("Could not allocate the thread's stack!\n");
00091   return;
00092  }
00093 
00094  if (ALL_OK != createthread(thread, thread_stack+4096))
00095  {
00096   prints("createthread failed!\n");
00097   return;
00098  }
00099 
00100  /* This is the producer. */
00101  while(1)
00102  {
00103   if (ALL_OK != semaphoredown(empty_semaphore_handle))
00104   {
00105    prints("semaphoredown failed!\n");
00106    break;
00107   }
00108 
00109   if (ALL_OK != semaphoredown(mutex_semaphore_handle))
00110   {
00111    prints("semaphoredown failed!\n");
00112    break;
00113   }
00114 
00115   buffer[head]=counter++;
00116   head=(head+1)&15;
00117 
00118   if (ALL_OK != semaphoreup(mutex_semaphore_handle))
00119   {
00120    prints("semaphoreup failed!\n");
00121    break;
00122   }
00123 
00124   if (ALL_OK != semaphoreup(full_semaphore_handle))
00125   {
00126    prints("semaphoreup failed!\n");
00127    break;
00128   }
00129  }
00130 }
